name: AreaCalculator
0:
”Alexa, ask area calculator what the area of a trapezoid is”
”Alexa, ask area calculator what is the area of a square with side length two”
”Alexa, ask area calculator area of a trapezoid with bases three and two and height five”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: area calculator
des:
This skill can provide the area formulas of basic shapes as well as calculate the area of basic shapes when given specific dimensions.

Somethings you can ask include:
what is the area of a square
what is the area of a trapezoid
what is the area of a parallelogram
what is the area of a triangle with base five and height six
what is the area of a trapezoid with bases three and two and height five
what is the area of a circle with radius twenty
what is the area of a square with side length four
what is the area of a parallelogram with base nine and height three

Future Updates:
Support decimal values for dimensions
Support more shapes
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
